name: Pawed Up
description:
Arcade-like game where you try to pet the cat for as long as you can!

Carefully crafted and realistic simulation of petting a cat.
The cat will get annoyed easily and if you annoy it too much it's game over for you!

Also almost completely broken. Playable, but the cat doesn't tolerate your presence for long, there is no audio and Unity despised the cats rig.
https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/pawed-0
